title: 1 Bedroom/Convertible 590 sqft
posting_body: 1 Bedroom/Convertible apartment in Columbus Plaza, 590 sqft.
Great location, 1 block from Millennium park and on the river.
Short walk to the loop and metra.
You would be taking over my lease, starting of this October to May, 15 2023 with an option to renew.
You must be approved by the building, so if you're interested I will set you up with the building leasing office which will require a background check and deposit.
The building has a gym and lounge as well as valet parking and indoor bike storage, but you would have to set this up with the building and it will cost extra.
Pets are allowed, and the Lakeshore East dog park is across the street.
